metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8719 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A logic issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue isfixed in tvOS 13, iTunes for Windows 12.10.1, iCloud for Windows 10.7,iCloud for Windows 7.14. Processing maliciously crafted web content maylead to universal cross site scripting.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8719` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.24.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.24.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.24.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.24.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.24.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.24.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.24.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
